acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Hullihen collection was made a gift to the University of Virginia Library by Louise Beck of Bryn Mawr, Pennsylvania on July 16, l958.

processinfo.head: Funding Note
processinfo.p: Funded in part by a grant from the National Endowment for the Humanities

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection of approximately 10 items (1933-1937, n.d.) contains the manuscripts and notes used by Elizabeth C. Hullihenwhile translating La Estrella de Sevilla, by Lope de Vega Carpio, for publication. The Star of Sevillewas published locally in 1955.
